sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD orgCd , ( SELECT X.ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) orgNm , ( SELECT X.ORG_RANK FROM ( SELECT ORG_RANK FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) ORGRANK , ( SELECT Y.FULL_ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT FULL_ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) Y WHERE ROWNUM = 1) fullOrgNm , DECODE(SIGN(3-SUM(ORG_TYPE)),1,1,3) orgType , PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd FROM TB_ORG T INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE PARENT_ORG_CD = 'A000' AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
GROUP BY ORG_CD,PARENT_ORG_CD UNION SELECT '0000' orgCd , '본사' orgNm , 0 ORGRANK , '본사' fullOrgNm , 1 orgType , null parentOrgCd FROM DUAL ) ORDER BY ORGRANK

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD orgCd , ( SELECT X.ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) orgNm , ( SELECT X.ORG_ORDER_CD FROM ( SELECT ORG_ORDER_CD FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) orgOrderCd , ( SELECT Y.FULL_ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT FULL_ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) Y WHERE ROWNUM = 1) fullOrgNm , DECODE(SIGN(3-SUM(ORG_TYPE)),1,1,3) orgType , PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd FROM TB_ORG T INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND ORG_CD != 'A000'
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND T.EXC_TYPE = 'N' OR (EXC_TYPE = 'B' AND EXC_PARENT = #orgCd# AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#) GROUP BY ORG_CD,PARENT_ORG_CD ) ORDER BY orgOrderCd

SELECT ORG.ORG_CD orgCd FROM TB_ORG ORG INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ORG.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE ORG_CD IN (SELECT T.ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG T CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ORG_CD = DECODE(T.EXC_TYPE, 'B', T.EXC_PARENT, T.PARENT_ORG_CD) START WITH T.PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND T.ORG_CD != 'A000' UNION SELECT #orgCd# FROM DUAL) AND ORG.ORG_TYPE = 3 AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
GROUP BY ORG.ORG_CD

SELECT X.IMPL_STATE implState , COUNT(*) stateCount FROM ( SELECT TII.ITEM_ID , TII.ORG_CD , TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR , TII.IMPL_STATE FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TEXT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TEXT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TEXT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL_MNG TMLIM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLIM.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMLIM.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
TMLIM.MNG_ORG_CD = #mngOrgCd#
TMLM.DIS_CLA_CODE = #disClaCode#
TII.ORG_CD IN ( SELECT T.ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG T CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ORG_CD = DECODE(T.EXC_TYPE, 'B', T.EXC_PARENT, T.PARENT_ORG_CD) START WITH T.PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND T.ORG_CD != 'A000' UNION SELECT #orgCd# FROM DUAL)
GROUP BY TII.ITEM_ID,TII.ORG_CD,TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR,TII.IMPL_STATE) X GROUP BY X.IMPL_STATE

SELECT ORG_CD orgCd , ( SELECT X.ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG T INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND T.ORG_CD = #orgCd# ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) orgNm , ( SELECT Y.FULL_ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT FULL_ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG T INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND T.ORG_CD = #orgCd# ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) Y WHERE ROWNUM = 1) fullOrgNm , DECODE(SIGN(3-SUM(ORG_TYPE)),1,1,3) orgType , PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd FROM TB_ORG T INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND T.ORG_CD = #orgCd# GROUP BY ORG_CD,PARENT_ORG_CD

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ORG_CD orgCd , ( SELECT X.ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) orgNm , ( SELECT X.ORG_ORDER_CD FROM ( SELECT ORG_ORDER_CD FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) X WHERE ROWNUM = 1) orgOrderCd , ( SELECT Y.FULL_ORG_NM FROM ( SELECT FULL_ORG_NM FROM TB_ORG ST INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on ST.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
AND ST.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD ORDER BY OPT_TIME_YEAR DESC ,OPT_TIME_HALF DESC ) Y WHERE ROWNUM = 1) fullOrgNm , DECODE(SIGN(3-SUM(ORG_TYPE)),1,1,3) orgType , T.PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd FROM TB_ORG T INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT on T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE T.MNG_YN = 'Y' AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear#
TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#
T.ORG_CD = #mngOrgCd#
GROUP BY T.ORG_CD,T.PARENT_ORG_CD ) ORDER BY orgOrderCd

SELECT ORG_CD orgCd , ORG_NM orgNm , FULL_ORG_NM fullOrgNm , ORG_TYPE orgType , PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd FROM TB_ORG T LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT ON T.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND T.ORG_CD = #orgCd#

SELECT TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID lawMainId , TMLM.LAW_MAIN_NO lawMainNo , TMLM.LAW_MAIN_NM lawMainNm FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD = #orgCd# GROUP BY TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID, TMLM.LAW_MAIN_NO, TMLM.LAW_MAIN_NM ORDER BY TMLM.LAW_MAIN_NO

SELECT TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID lawSubId , TMLS.LAW_SUB_NO lawSubNo , TMLS.LAW_SUB_NM lawSubNm , TMLS.LAW_SUB_ETC lawSubEtc FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID = #lawMainId#
TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID = #lawSubId#
TMLR.LAW_REL_ID = #lawRelId#
GROUP BY TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID,TMLS.LAW_SUB_NO,TMLS.LAW_SUB_NM,TMLS.LAW_SUB_ETC ORDER BY TMLS.LAW_SUB_NO

SELECT TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID lawSubId , TMLS.LAW_SUB_NO lawSubNo , TMLS.LAW_SUB_NM lawSubNm , TMLS.LAW_SUB_ETC lawSubEtc FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD IN ( SELECT T.ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG T CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ORG_CD = DECODE(T.EXC_TYPE, 'B', T.EXC_PARENT, T.PARENT_ORG_CD) START WITH T.PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND T.ORG_CD != 'A000' UNION SELECT #orgCd# FROM DUAL) AND TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID = #lawMainId#
TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID = #lawSubId#
TMLR.LAW_REL_ID = #lawRelId#
GROUP BY TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID,TMLS.LAW_SUB_NO,TMLS.LAW_SUB_NM,TMLS.LAW_SUB_ETC

SELECT TMLR.LAW_REL_ID lawRelId , TMLR.LAW_REL_NM lawRelNm FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID = #lawSubId# GROUP BY TMLR.LAW_REL_ID,TMLR.LAW_REL_NM ORDER BY TMLR.LAW_REL_NM

SELECT TMLR.LAW_REL_ID lawRelId , TMLR.LAW_REL_NM lawRelNm FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD IN (SELECT T.ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG T CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ORG_CD = DECODE(T.EXC_TYPE, 'B', T.EXC_PARENT, T.PARENT_ORG_CD) START WITH T.PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND T.ORG_CD != 'A000' UNION SELECT #orgCd# FROM DUAL) AND TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID = #lawSubId#
TMLR.LAW_REL_ID = #lawRelId#
GROUP BY TMLR.LAW_REL_ID,TMLR.LAW_REL_NM ORDER BY TMLR.LAW_REL_NM

SELECT TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID lawImplId , TMLT.TEXT text , TMLI.ITM_REQR itmReqr , TMLI.ITM_ATTN itmAttn , TMLI.IMPL_PROD implProd FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID = #lawSubId# GROUP BY TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID,TMLT.TEXT,TMLI.ITM_REQR,TMLI.ITM_ATTN,TMLI.IMPL_PROD

SELECT TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID lawImplId , TMLT.TEXT text , TMLI.ITM_REQR itmReqr , TMLI.ITM_ATTN itmAttn , TMLI.IMPL_PROD implProd FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TMLT ON TMLI.LAW_CTTS_ID = TMLT.LAW_CTTS_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS ON TMLT.LAW_SUB_ID = TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TPL ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TPL.MST_LAW_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM ON TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID WHERE TPL.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TPL.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# AND TII.ORG_CD IN (SELECT T.ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG T CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ORG_CD = DECODE(T.EXC_TYPE, 'B', T.EXC_PARENT, T.PARENT_ORG_CD) START WITH T.PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND T.ORG_CD != 'A000' UNION SELECT #orgCd# FROM DUAL) AND TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID = #lawSubId#
TMLR.LAW_REL_ID = #lawRelId#
TMLR.LAW_REL_ID IS NULL
GROUP BY TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID,TMLT.TEXT,TMLI.ITM_REQR,TMLI.ITM_ATTN,TMLI.IMPL_PROD

SELECT T.ORG_CD orgCd , T.ORG_NM orgNm , T.FULL_ORG_NM fullOrgNm , T.ORG_TYPE orgType , T.PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd , TMLIM.LAW_IMPL_ID lawImplId FROM TB_MST_LAW_IMPL_MNG TMLIM LEFT JOIN TB_ORG T ON TMLIM.MNG_ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD AND TMLIM.MST_LAW_ID = T.MST_LAW_ID AND T.MNG_YN = 'Y'

SELECT TMLR.LAW_REL_ID lawRelId , TMLR.LAW_REL_NM lawRelNm , TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID lawRelDtlId , TMLRD.LAW_REL_ATC lawRelAtc , TMLRD.LAW_REL_ATC_SUB lawRelAtcSub , TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID lawImplId FROM TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP TMLRM LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL TMLRD ON TMLRM.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = TMLRD.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL TMLR ON TMLRD.LAW_REL_ID = TMLR.LAW_REL_ID LEFT JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL TMLI ON TMLRM.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMLI.LAW_IMPL_ID

SELECT TII.ITEM_ID itemId , TII.IMPL_STATE implState , TII.INSPECT inspect , TII.INSPECT_STATE inspectState , TII.IMPL_FILE_ID implFileId , TII.POINT_OUT_FILE_ID pointOutFileId , TII.LAW_IMPL_ID lawImplId , TMIO.ORG_CD orgCd , TII.UNIMPL_REASON unimplReason FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID

SELECT TII.ITEM_ID itemId , TII.IMPL_STATE implState , TII.INSPECT inspect , TII.INSPECT_STATE inspectState , TII.IMPL_FILE_ID implFileId , TII.POINT_OUT_FILE_ID pointOutFileId , TII.LAW_IMPL_ID lawImplId , TII.UNIMPL_REASON unimplReason FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII INNER JOIN TB_MST_IMPL_ORG TMIO ON TII.LAW_IMPL_ID = TMIO.LAW_IMPL_ID AND TII.ORG_CD = TMIO.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = TMIO.MST_LAW_ID AND TMIO.ORG_CD IN (SELECT T.ORG_CD FROM TB_ORG T CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ORG_CD = DECODE(T.EXC_TYPE, 'B', T.EXC_PARENT, T.PARENT_ORG_CD) START WITH T.PARENT_ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND T.ORG_CD != 'A000' UNION SELECT #orgCd# FROM DUAL)

SELECT TE.EQUIP_ID equipId , TE.EQUIP_NM equipNm FROM TB_EQUIP TE INNER JOIN TB_ORG_LAW_REL_EQUIP TOLRE ON TE.EQUIP_ID = TOLRE.EQUIP_ID WHERE TOLRE.ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND TOLRE.LAW_REL_ID = #lawRelId# AND TOLRE.MST_LAW_ID = (SELECT TMLT.MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf#)

SELECT LAW_MAIN_ID lawMainId , LAW_MAIN_NO lawMainNo , LAW_MAIN_NM lawMainNm FROM TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TPL TMLT ON TMLM.MST_LAW_ID = TMLT.MST_LAW_ID WHERE TMLT.OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND TMLT.OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ORDER BY TMLM.LAW_MAIN_NO

SELECT TMLS.LAW_SUB_ID lawSubId , TMLS.LAW_SUB_NO lawSubNo , TMLS.LAW_SUB_NM lawSubNm , TMLS.LAW_SUB_ETC lawSubEtc FROM TB_MST_LAW_SUB TMLS INNER JOIN TB_MST_LAW_MAIN TMLM ON TMLS.LAW_MAIN_ID = TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID WHERE TMLM.LAW_MAIN_ID = #lawMainId# ORDER BY TMLS.LAW_SUB_SORT
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_IMPL_ITEM SET IMPL_STATE = #implState# WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UPDATE TB_IMPL_ITEM SET INSPECT = #inspect# WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UPDATE TB_IMPL_ITEM SET INSPECT_STATE = #inspectState# WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
UPDATE TB_IMPL_ITEM SET UNIMPL_REASON = #unimplReason# WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.ORG_CD orgCd , T.ORG_NM orgNm , T.FULL_ORG_NM fullOrgNm , T.ORG_TYPE orgType , T.PARENT_ORG_CD parentOrgCd , TII.ITEM_ID itemId FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM TII LEFT JOIN TB_ORG T ON TII.ORG_CD = T.ORG_CD AND TII.MST_LAW_ID = T.MST_LAW_ID
SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , FILE_SN fileSn , ORIGNL_FILE_NM name , STRE_FILE_NM url , ATCH_TY atchTy FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL

SELECT ITM.ITEM_ID ITEMID , ITM.ORG_CD ORGCD , IMP.LAW_IMPL_ID LAWIMPLID , TXT.LAW_CTTS_ID LAWCTTSID , IMP.IMPL_PROD IMPLPROD , TXT.TEXT TEXT , IMP.ITM_REQR ITMREQR , IMP.ITM_ATTN ITMATTN , ITM.IMPL_STATE IMPLSTATE , ITM.INSPECT INSPECT , ITM.INSPECT_STATE INSPECTSTATE , ITM.IMPL_FILE_ID IMPLFILEID , ITM.POINT_OUT_FILE_ID POINTOUTFILEID , TXT.LAW_SUB_ID LAWSUBID , ITM.UNIMPL_REASON UNIMPLREASON FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM ITM JOIN TB_MST_LAW_IMPL IMP ON ITM.LAW_IMPL_ID = IMP.LAW_IMPL_ID JOIN TB_MST_LAW_TEXT TXT ON IMP.LAW_CTTS_ID = TXT.LAW_CTTS_ID WHERE ITM.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND ORG_CD = #orgCd# ORDER BY TXT.LAW_SUB_ID , TXT.LAW_CTTS_ID , IMP.LAW_IMPL_ID

SELECT MPN.LAW_IMPL_ID LAWIMPLID , MPN.MST_LAW_ID MSTLAWID , MPN.MNG_ORG_CD MNGORGCD , ORG.ORG_NM MNGORGNM , ORG.FULL_ORG_NM FULLORGNM , ORG.PARENT_ORG_CD PARENTORGCD FROM TB_MST_LAW_IMPL_MNG MPN JOIN TB_ORG ORG ON MPN.MST_LAW_ID = ORG.MST_LAW_ID AND MPN.MNG_ORG_CD = ORG.ORG_CD WHERE MPN.LAW_IMPL_ID IN ( SELECT IMP.LAW_IMPL_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_IMPL IMP JOIN TB_IMPL_ITEM ITM ON IMP.LAW_IMPL_ID = ITM.LAW_IMPL_ID WHERE ITM.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND ITM.ORG_CD = #orgCd# )

SELECT MPN.LAW_IMPL_ID LAWIMPLID , REL.LAW_REL_ID LAWRELID , REL.LAW_REL_NM LAWRELNM , DTL.LAW_REL_DTL_ID LAWRELDTLID , DTL.LAW_REL_ATC LAWRELATC , DTL.LAW_REL_ATC_SUB LAWRELATCSUB FROM TB_MST_LAW_REL REL JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL DTL ON REL.LAW_REL_ID = DTL.LAW_REL_ID JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP MPN ON DTL.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = MPN.LAW_REL_DTL_ID WHERE MPN.LAW_IMPL_ID IN ( SELECT ITM.LAW_IMPL_ID FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM ITM WHERE ITM.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND ITM.ORG_CD = #orgCd# )

SELECT EQP.EQUIP_ID EQUIPID , EQP.EQUIP_NM EQUIPNM , MPN.LAW_REL_ID LAWRELID FROM TB_EQUIP EQP JOIN TB_ORG_LAW_REL_EQUIP MPN ON EQP.EQUIP_ID = MPN.EQUIP_ID AND MPN.ORG_CD = #orgCd# AND MPN.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) WHERE MPN.LAW_REL_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT DTL.LAW_REL_ID LAWRELID FROM TB_MST_LAW_REL_DTL DTL JOIN TB_MST_LAW_REL_MAP MPN ON DTL.LAW_REL_DTL_ID = MPN.LAW_REL_DTL_ID WHERE MPN.LAW_IMPL_ID IN ( SELECT ITM.LAW_IMPL_ID FROM TB_IMPL_ITEM ITM WHERE ITM.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) AND ITM.ORG_CD = #orgCd# ) )

SELECT LAW.LAW_MAIN_ID LAWMAINID , LAW.LAW_MAIN_NO LAWMAINNO , LAW.LAW_MAIN_NM LAWMAINNM , SUB.LAW_SUB_ID LAWSUBID , SUB.LAW_SUB_NO LAWSUBNO , SUB.LAW_SUB_NM LAWSUBNM FROM TB_MST_LAW_MAIN LAW JOIN TB_MST_LAW_SUB SUB ON LAW.LAW_MAIN_ID = SUB.LAW_MAIN_ID WHERE LAW.MST_LAW_ID = ( SELECT MST_LAW_ID FROM TB_MST_LAW_TPL WHERE OPT_TIME_YEAR = #optTimeYear# AND OPT_TIME_HALF = #optTimeHalf# ) ORDER BY LAW.LAW_MAIN_NO , SUB.LAW_SUB_NO
